title: Public Records Request: Violent Crime Intervention Fund

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Public Records Request: Violent Crime Intervention Fund
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

According to documents released by the State of Tennessee, the Brentwood Police Department received $106,883 in funding awarded in 2022 from the Violent Crime Intervention Fund: https://www.tn.gov/content/dam/tn/finance/ocjp/VCIF%20Funding%20Plan.pdf

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of all documents, including but not limited to, applications, agreements, and reporting documents related to the $106,883 received as part of the 2022 Violent Crime Intervention Fund.  

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with e.

communications.subject: Records Request Confirmation
communications.communication:
Thank you for submitting a request for records to the City of Brentwood, TN.

Your request security key is 471653.
Your request reference number is Request Number: PRR-747-2023.

You can check the status of your request from the request tracking portal.  You will need your security key and reference number above.

Note: This is an automated email notification. Please do not respond to this email.

communications.subject: City of Brentwood Records Request PRR-747-2023 Completed
communications.communication:
We have completed your request for public records. Please retrieve your documents from the request tracking portal.  You will need your Request Number (PRR-747-2023) and Security Key (471653) in order to access your records.  If you have any problems downloading your documents, please email me at holly.earls@brentwoodtn.gov.

Thank you, 
  
 Holly Earls, City Recorder 
  
 City of Brentwood, TN 
  
 615-371-2234


*Note: This is an automated email notification. Please do not respond to this email.
